function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic episodes impacting labor market","Impact":"Disruption to labor market, economic instability","Mitigation":"Investing in pandemic preparedness, healthcare, and support for affected workers","Technologies":"Predictive modeling, healthcare technology, remote work technology","People":"Workers, policymakers, healthcare workers, affected individuals","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, employers"},{"Description":"Automation leading to inequality and unemployment","Impact":"Job loss, income inequality, social unrest","Mitigation":"Investing in skill development, retraining programs, universal basic income","Technologies":"Automation, education technology, job matching platforms","People":"Workers, non-participants, policymakers","Owner":"Government, education institutions, employers"}]}
